tooltip:
Advanced Fortune
 
Increases trigger changes of all towers by [color=GOLD]1.3%[/color]

Element Mastery
 
Increases starting force points by [color=GOLD]5[/color].

Swiftness Mastery
 
Increases attack speed of all towers by [color=GOLD]0.85%[/color].

Combat Mastery
 
Increases base attack damage of all towers by [color=GOLD]1%[/color].

Mastery of Pain
 
Increases attack and spell critical strike chance of all towers by [color=GOLD]0.5%[/color].

Advanced Sorcery
 
Increases spell damage of all towers by [color=GOLD]1.25%[/color].

Mastery of Magic
 
Increases mana pool and regeneration of all towers by [color=GOLD]2.5%[/color].

Mastery of Logistics
 
Increases food limit by [color=GOLD]2[/color].

Loot Mastery
 
Increases item find chance of all towers by [color=GOLD]1.5%[/color].

Advanced Wisdom
 
Increases experience gain of all towers by [color=GOLD]2.5%[/color].
